pageProduct.name: Panadol Mini Caps for Pain Relief Paracetamol 500mg 48
pageProduct.description:
Information

Benefits of Panadol Mini Caps

• Mini Caps are capsule-shaped and have a gelatin coating over the tablet that is designed to slip down your throat and allow for easy swallowing

• Like other Panadol products, Panadol Mini Caps are gentle on the stomach

When to Use Panadol Mini Caps?

Panadol Mini Caps provide fast effective temporary relief of pain and discomfort associated with:

• Headache/Tension headache

• Migraine headache

• Muscular aches

• Backache

• Arthritis/Osteoarthritis

• Period pain

• Toothache

Why Choose Panadol Mini Caps?

Mini Caps are an easy to swallow pain relief option from Australia's Most Trusted Pain Relief Brand.* The small capsule-shaped tablets have a smooth gelatin coating for easy swallowing. Like other Panadol products, Panadol Mini Caps are gentle on the stomach.

*Reader's Digest Trusted Brands Survey Australia, 2018

Explore our Range

Panadol Extra

• The ingredients in Panadol Extra are a clinically proven combination of ingredients to fight tough pain

• Each caplet contains paracetamol and caffeine, plus advanced Optizorb technology, designed to fight five types of tough pain

Panadol Rapid

• Panadol Rapid Is absorbed twice as fast as regular Panadol tablets

Panadol Optizorb

• The Optizorb Formulation contains a patented delivery system which allows it to deliver paracetamol more efficiently by breaking down faster than regular Panadol tablets

Panadol Mini Caps

• A physically smaller capsule-shaped tablet with a smooth gelatin coating for easy swallowing

• No gluten, lactose or sugar

Panadol Osteo

• The paracetamol in Panadol Osteo Is released In 2 stages, with the first stage being released quickly, for rapid onset of action, and the second stage being released slowly over the day or night, to provide prolonged pain relief

• Panadol Osteo tablets are gentle on the stomach*

*When used as directed

This medicine may not be right for you. Read the warnings before purchase. Follow the directions for use. If symptoms persist, talk to your healthcare professional. Incorrect use could be harmful.

General Information

Panadol Tablets are effective on pain and gentle on stomachs.

Panadol Mini Caps (for pain relief) are an easy to swallow, pain relief option from Australia's Most Trusted Pain Relief Brand.* The small capsule-shaped tablets have a smooth gelatin-coating for easy swallowing. Like other Panadol tablets and caplets, Panadol Mini Caps provide pain relief and are gentle on the stomach.

Panadol Mini Caps provide fast and effective relief of pain associated with: headache, tension headache, cold and flu symptoms, migraine headache, muscular aches, arthritis, osteoarthritis, backache and period pain. Panadol Mini Caps also reduce fever.

 

Panadol Mini Caps are capsule-shaped, and have a gelatin-coating over the tablet that allows for easy swallowing.

  • Provide fast, effective relief from headache, body aches, and toothache.
  • Reduce fever and are gentle on the stomach.
  • Small capsule-shaped tablets.
  • Smooth gelatin-coating for easy swallowing.
  • Suitable for people with stomach ulcers.

Panadol Mini Caps provide fast, effective relief of pain and discomfort associated with:

  • Headache/Tension headache
  • Toothache
  • Cold & flu symptoms
  • Migraine headache
  • Muscular aches
  • Arthritis/Osteoarthritis
  • Backache
  • Period pain

*Reader's Digest Trusted Brands Survey Australia, 2018

Suitable For: People with stomach ulcers, Breastfeeding mothers.

Boxed Contents: 48 Mini Caps

Size: 48 Mini Caps

Warnings

Do not use Panadol Mini Caps:
- If you are allergic to paracetamol, caffeine or hydroxybenzoates
- If using other medicines containing paracetamol or caffeine
- For children below age 12
- For more than 48 hours for children aged 12-17 except on medical advice
- For more than a few days at a time in adults except on medical advice
- If pregnant, except on medical advice
- If any of the seals on this packaging are broken
- If the package use-by date has expired
- Until you read the enclosed leaflet carefully"

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children.
Use only if seals are intact."

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

While using Panadol Mini Caps for pain relief:
If an overdose is taken or suspected, ring the Poisons Information Centre (AUST: 13 11 26; NZ: 0800 764 766) or go to the hospital immediately, even if you feel well because of the risk of delayed, serious liver damage if left untreated.

ESSENTIAL SAFETY INFORMATION

Keep out of reach of children.
Does not contain gluten, lactose or sugar.

Ingredients

Each caplet contains Paracetamol 500mg.

Active Ingredients: Each caplet contains Paracetamol 500mg.

Contains: Each gelatin coated tablet contains paracetamol 500mg.

Directions

Age: 12- Adult, Tablets: 1-2, How often: every 4-6 hrs with water as required (maximum 8 tablets in 24 hrs).
Age: 7-12, Tablets: 1/2-1, How often: every 4-6 hrs with water as required (maximum 4 tablets in 24 hrs).

USAGE ADVICE

HOW TO USE PANADOL MINI CAPS (FOR PAIN RELIEF):
Place mini cap(s) in mouth and swallow with water.
Age: 12-Adult
Tablets: 1-2
How often: every 4-6 hours with water as required (maximum 8 caplets in 24 hours)

Age: 7-12
Tablets:1
How often: every 4-6 hours with water as required (maximum 4 caplets in 24 hours)

Storage Temperature: Store below 25°C
